siteMetadata.title: Norman and OKC Personal Protective Equipment Squad
siteMetadata.description: Join Norman and OKC volunteers in donating 3D Printed PPE.

node.excerpt: This volunteer group was started to help spread useful information on what can be created and used at local health care centers.  Join our Facebook Groups There are two groups, one for the production side, and one for the design side. Production…

How can I help? Donation of materials we need. We currently need: PETG (preferred) or PLA, 1.75 mm, no “add-ins” like glitter or similar. Unopened packages preferred. 0.5 mm to 1.0mm PETG clear plastic sheets at least 16x10 inches. Other types can be…
